welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gallarate, a charming city in Italy known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. Immerse yourself in our culture, cuisine, and local gems – we invite you to enjoy the warmth and beauty of our city."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
